item.title: Scientists Made Human Eggs from Skin Cells and Used Them to Form Embryos
item.description: The embryos weren’t used to try to establish a pregnancy, but the researchers behind the technique say it could one day be used to address infertility...

item.title: The Blink Arc Can Merge Two Security Cameras for a 180-Degree View
item.description: Amazon-owned Blink debuted new cameras with 2K resolution and an accessory that enables a wider field of view.

item.title: Google's Latest AI Ransomware Defense Only Goes So Far
item.description: Google has launched a new AI-based protection in Drive for desktop that can shut down an attack before it spreads—but its benefits have their limits.

item.title: DoorDash’s New Delivery Robot Rolls Out Into the Big, Cruel World
item.description: The hype around delivery robots has fizzled, but DoorDash is still determined to launch Dot, an adorable red bot. It can ride on roads and in bike lan...
